section.p: requires real or virtual resource pool hosts that implement the 64-bit version of the x86 instruction set, and support RHEL/CentOS 7.1 or 7.2.

For delegate hosts supporting the recommended multi-host configuration, in which the master host is in its own, separate resource pool, the resources of delegate hosts must support all of the application services. For more information, refer to your application documentation.

In all cases, delegate hosts need enough RAM, CPU, and storage resources to support the services assigned to the resource pool to which the hosts belong. In all cases, the resources of all delegate hosts in a resource pool should be identical.
